nodes.text: According to the Jawa trader Klikk, an RX-Series droid experienced a spectacular malfunction on the planet Naboo when its owner had stepped down from a starship boarding ramp. At that point, the droid flew away with the starship. Although the Naboo system observation post sent starfighters to stop the RX-Series pilot droid, it eluded them and jumped to lightspeed, on course to the region of the galaxy housing the planets Bothawui, Nal Hutta, and Rodia.
